name: 3 Stories of Mid-War Friendship
short_description: War is one of those awful things that humans have taken part in since the beginning of time. Army and navy strategists have developed a variety of tactics for more effective combat, and while many of today’s wars primarily involve battles between politicians, they still involve great casualties, immense resources, and injuries that affect surviving soldiers far beyond the physical. But even amidst the bloodiest battles are glimmers of hope, humanity, and friendship. Here are just a few mid-war moments of friendship.
summary: War is one of those awful things that humans have taken part
